Sentencas: In literature, little is reported on the experimental studies of Methane Steam Reforming (MSR) kinetics in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) when a current is drawn.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density

Sentencas: This work investigates MSR reaction kinetics in a complete SOFC with a Ni-Gd0.1Ce0.9O2-delta (Ni-GDC) anode under varying gas compositions, operating temperatures and current densities in order to obtain reliable experimental data for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) modeling studies.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density

Sentencas: Consistent with previous work, the methane conversion X-CH4 decreases as the temperature decreases.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density

Sentencas: A slight increase in the MSR reaction rate is observed when a current is drawn.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density

Sentencas: A positive dependency of the MSR reaction rate on methane concentration was found.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density

Sentencas: Current has an insignificant influence on the methane reaction order.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density

Sentencas: Under open-circuit working condition, steam concentration has a slightly positive influence at higher temperature and a slightly negative influence at lower temperature on the MSR reaction rate.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density

Sentencas: The influence of steam concentration on the reaction rate becomes more negative when a current is drawn.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density

Sentencas: It is probably due to the blockage of reaction sites by the adsorbed oxygen/water molecules/ions.
Titulo: Study of Methane Steam Reforming kinetics in operating Solid Oxide Fuel Cells: Influence of current density
